metadata.description: Selective installation system for Claude Code skills, agents, and rules

plugins.name: claude-skills
plugins.description: A centralized registry of reusable components for Claude Code. Select and install only the skills, agents, and rules your project needs. Includes git-workflow skill with conventional commits, Bash agent for safe command execution, code-style rules, and more. Keep your Claude Code context slim and focused by installing only what you use.
